text.autoconfig.cntiertagger.title: Cntier Tagger
text.autoconfig.cntiertagger.option.sele: Specify the mode in which you want to (prioritize) display Tier
text.autoconfig.cntiertagger.option.disp:
SELECED_ONLY: Only use the selected mode and do not display when players are no tier in that mode.
HIGHEST-ONLY: Only displays the mode with the highest tier for the player. When this option is selected, the game mode option will not work
MIXED: Prioritize using the selected mode when it has a tier, otherwise use the mode with the highest tier
text.autoconfig.cntiertagger.option.rend: Control the display of Tier on the right or left side of the nametag
